definition: side/edge/margin/border/boundary/proximity/thread (of ideas, plots etc)/see also 邊|边[bian1]
suffix of a noun of locality
side/edge/margin/border/boundary/CL:個|个[ge4]/simultaneously
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final
erhua variant of 上邊|上边[shang4 bian5]
erhua variant of 下邊|下边[xia4 bian5]
erhua variant of 前邊|前边[qian2 bian5]
erhua variant of 北邊|北边[bei3 bian1]
erhua variant of 南邊|南边[nan2 bian5]
erhua variant of 右邊|右边[you4 bian5]
erhua variant of 外邊|外边[wai4 bian5]
erhua variant of 左邊|左边[zuo3 bian5]
erhua variant of 後邊|后边[hou4 bian5]
erhua variant of 挨邊|挨边[ai1 bian1]
to strike the edge of the gong/(fig.) to stir the pot (i.e. cause or exacerbate a dispute)
erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]
to be likely or possible/to begin to take shape/to be likely to succeed
erhua variant of 東邊|东边[dong1 bian5]
to trim (border with braid, tape etc)

sentences.english: A long whip stitch or overhand stitch overlying an edge to prevent raveling.
sentences.chinese: 为了防止散开而包着边儿缝的一种缝法。

sentences.english: They're never anything to do with science.
sentences.chinese: 那里的人从来不谈论和科学沾边儿的事情。

sentences.english: You mean the new Wukesong Culture and Sports Center next to the 4th Ring Road?
sentences.chinese: 你是说四环边儿上五棵松文化体育中心的新建场馆吗？

sentences.english: Customer: Actually, I"m more interested in these here."
sentences.chinese: 其实，我更想看看这边儿这些。

sentences.english: We cook so many things as we drive.
sentences.chinese: 我们边开着车边儿煮了好多东西。

sentences.english: The black car swerved out in an attempt to get alongside her.
sentences.chinese: 那辆黑色汽车忽然转向，试图靠上她的边儿。

sentences.english: The station will be headed by a veteran worker .
sentences.chinese: 老领导刚退休，很不习惯这种靠边儿站的生活。

sentences.english: The felt on his wading boots was as white as snow. A handcrafted net swung on his back.
sentences.chinese: 水靴的毛毡边儿洁白如雪，手工编制的鱼网背在背上。

sentences.english: This way please, this is your table.
sentences.chinese: 这边儿请，这是你们的桌子。

definition: edge (used directly after a noun, e.g. roadside 馬路沿兒|马路沿儿)
erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]
place/space
erhua variant of 東邊|东边[dong1 bian5]
near
foot of a wall
relevant/to the point/has sth to do with the matter (also used with negative)
to see
(dialect) oneself/by oneself
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc
child/son
non-syllabic diminutive suffix/retroflex final
desk/(pool etc) table
platform/stand
erhua variant of 拐彎|拐弯[guai3 wan1]
corner/nook/recess/out-of-the-way place
(dialect) very
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
curb
